pos_mean_info_list.mean: 救助者；节俭的人；节约装置

word_group.brief_definition: 上帝拯救灵魂的恩典；可取之处；可资弥补的特点

bilingual.target: 节约用电可以涵养能源。
节约时间意味着更高的效率。
他们通过节约资源来减少浪费。

bilingual.source: You can reduce expenses by saving water.
bilingual.target: 你可以通过节约用水来减少开支。

bilingual.source: By saving energy, we can protect the environment.
bilingual.target: 通过节约能源，我们可以保护环境。

bilingual.source: You can reduce your electricity bill by saving power.
bilingual.target: 你可以通过节约用电来降低电费。

bilingual.source: Saving energy is very important for environmental protection.
bilingual.target: 节约能源对环境保护非常重要。

bilingual.source: Saving electric energy is crucial for environmental protection.
bilingual.target: 节约电能对环境保护非常重要。

bilingual.source: To save energy, we should adopt some energy-saving measures.
bilingual.target: 为了节约能源，我们应该采取一些节能措施。

bilingual.source: In the long run, saving energy is good for the environment.
bilingual.target: 从长远来看，节约能源对环境有好处。

yingyinNormal.en: What were you doing? I was saving Smackle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你干什么去了？我当时正忙着救史麦科。

yingyinNormal.en: Saving the western atmosphere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 西岸的空气质量幸免于难。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you, Miss Rabbit, for saving my Tiddles. No problem. Thank you for saving us too. Just do my job. Goodbye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太感谢了，兔子小姐，是你救了小土豆一命。不用客气，女士。谢谢你也救了我们几个。这是我的工作，再见啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you for saving my life. I love you, Richard Parker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 感谢你救了我的命，我爱你，理查德·帕克。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, hear me out. Howard, you know we're saving up for a house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听我说完嘛。霍华德，你知道我们在存钱买房子。

yingyinNormal.en: I will tell you what is happening. I am saving my best friend's marriage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来告诉你是要闹哪样，我要以身拯救我死党的婚姻。

yingyinNormal.en: Those look, comfortable. They are. Thank you for saving the day back there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鞋子看起来,很舒服。是的。谢谢你让我脱离了这无聊的派对。

yingyinNormal.en: And then to have him ended up saving my life was the irony of the whole thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而让他停止挽救我的生命则会是对整件事的讽刺。

yingyinNormal.en: Honey, that thing I did back there for Peeta? That was called "saving his life."
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的，刚才我为皮塔做的事情叫做救他的命。

yingyinNormal.en: I got some news for you. You're not saving the species tonight or any other night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听清楚，你今晚救不了种族，以后也救不了!

yingyinNormal.en: Saving your life in London put me in a tight spot with some very dangerous people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在伦敦救你的事，让我陷入了非常危险的处境。

yingyinNormal.en: Everybody here, all of us, spend our days saving the lives of people we don't even know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们这里的每个人都在拯救素不相识的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Fine, I'll go out and buy you another box with the money I was saving for a Wet&Wild lip liner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好啦，我再出去给你买盒新的，就用我存下来要买唇线笔的钱好啦。

yingyinNormal.en: So their plan for saving the Earth from Armageddon is hoping a bunch of scientists can catch a ball?
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以他们拯救地球免于受末日般灾害的计划就是希望一帮书呆科学家能接住球吗？

yingyinNormal.en: You can stay here. Dorothy I have to. I will be a medic. I figure I'll be saving people not killing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能留在这儿。多萝西，我必须。我要当军医。我指我是去救人而非杀人。

yingyinNormal.en: And their role in saving the human race. We must put aside doubts and guilt. You are the chosen people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为他们扮演着拯救人类的角色。我们不应该质疑和内疚。你们是被选中的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, he was being a hero last night. He dislocated his shoulder saving a kid from the bus crash.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，他昨晚十分英勇，救下车祸中的孩子，导致肩膀脱臼。

yingyinNormal.en: On behalf of the Nova Corps, we'd like to express our profound gratitude for your help in saving Xandar.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们想代表新星军团深深感谢各位协助拯救柴达。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, this is really soft. Three hundred and fifty dollars? Down from 700. You're saving, like, 200 bucks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是很柔软，350元? 从700块打折下来!你差不多省了200块!

yingyinNormal.en: Can that be explained by blow-in? No, it's my conclusion that he's saving and replanting seeds. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那能用风吹解释吗？不能，我的结论是他在留种做二次耕种谢谢你。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 节省; 节约; 节俭

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 节约；节省；储蓄金；存款；保留；例外
vt. 解救；储蓄；保存；节省；（save的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: v. 救助；搭救；挽救；积攒；储蓄；节省；阻止对方得；阻止对方赢得；保存；减少

examination_example.sentence_trans: 十分之六的“未退休者”正在增加储蓄。

examination_example.sentence: Many retirees are increasing their <highlight>savings</highlight> by spending less.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多退休人员通过减少支出来增加储蓄。

examination_example.sentence: Many of their parents lost their jobs or their life <highlight>savings</highlight> or both during the crash of 2008.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的父母中有许多人在2008年的金融危机中失去了工作或毕生积蓄，或者两者都失去了。

sense_info_list.zh: 节省; 节约; 节俭

examination_example.sentence: Boiling down an individual's output to simple metrics, such as number of publications or journal impacts, entails considerable <highlight>savings</highlight> in time, energy and ambiguity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将个人的产出归结为简单、客观的指标，例如出版物数量或期刊影响力，需要大量节省时间、精力和模糊性。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

an economy of or reduction in money, time, or another resource

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 节约；节省；储蓄金；存款；保留；例外

word_family.mean: v. 救助；搭救；挽救；积攒；储蓄；节省；阻止对方得；阻止对方赢得；保存；减少

sense_info_list.en: an economy of or reduction in money; time; or another resource

examination_example.sentence: Employers argue they make considerable <highlight>savings</highlight> on real estate when workers shift from office to home work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雇主们称，当员工从办公室转移到家庭工作时，他们可以在房地产上省下一大笔钱。

examination_example.sentence: However, these <highlight>savings</highlight> result from passing costs on to workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这笔节省的资金是通过将成本转嫁给工人实现的。

examination_example.sentence: On the other hand, imagine the cost <highlight>savings</highlight> for local police enforcement and town budgets without all those speeding and parking tickets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，想象一下，如果没有了那些超速和违章停车的罚单，当地警察的执法和城镇预算会节省多少成本。

sense_info_list.en: the money one has saved; especially through a bank or official scheme

examination_example.sentence: If even a small part of such valueless work could be removed , the <highlight>savings</highlight> would run into millions of dollars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哪怕只去掉一小部分这种无价值的工作，也能节省数百万美元。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
